attributes.action: Allow people that have had ANY vaccination to travel abroad.
attributes.additional_details: I would like this to happen as so many people haven’t seen their family abroad for a long time like myself. In England we have been encouraged to get the vaccinations done. I have had both doses done for a couple of months, unfortunately the dose I had injected into me is not accepted for travelling abroad. This is not fair as we do not pick what vaccination we get injected with. Please can someone consider changing the rules and letting us travel.
attributes.background: I would like the government/parliament to consider letting the people who have had the 4120Z003 batch of vaccinations to be allowed to travel abroad.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Entry requirements are a decision for the Governments of those countries, not the UK Government or Parliament.
